Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial scaffold: Vite + PWA + retro UI structure

- package.json with Vite, PWA plugin, Vitest
- index.html with full UI layout \(header, library, sequencer, editor\)
- CSS with neon color palette \(magenta/cyan/green/orange on black\)
- Placeholder modules: SID engine, transport, sequencer, voice editor
- PWA manifest and icons folder
- PRD and SID domain knowledge docs

Ready for npm install && npm run dev

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
